description: This file defines a Flutter widget named ControlBar, providing Undo and Restart buttons for a 2048 game. It interacts with a GameProvider to perform game actions and determines if undo is possible based on the game score.

classes.name: ControlBar
classes.description: A stateless widget providing Undo and Restart controls for the 2048 game.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the control bar, including buttons for undo and restart.

methods.name: _canUndo
methods.description: Determines if the undo button should be enabled, based on the game score.
